posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this T206 Merkle with a Piedmont back for sale. Crease. Paper loss on the reverse.

Price: $24.95

Shipping: $2.75

Paypal, check, money order are all okay.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
You forgot to mention the diamond earring.
Say the magic word and the diamond is gone. Just a little dust on my scanner, no paper loss on the front of the card.

Ashes to ashes

Diamonds to dust.

:eek:;):D
